autoDetect.title: Auto-Detection

languages.title: 37+ Languages
languages.desc: Support for all major languages including RTL languages like Arabic and Hebrew.

translation.title: DeepL & Google
translation.desc: Integrate with DeepL or Google Translate APIs for high-quality automatic translations.

github.title: GitHub Actions
github.desc: Automatic translation on every push. Set it and forget it.

frameworks.title: Framework Agnostic
frameworks.desc: Works with React, Vue, Svelte, Angular, Node.js, Python, Ruby, Go, PHP, and more.

typescript.title: TypeScript Support
typescript.desc: Full TypeScript definitions included for type-safe development.
